freeze_authority: EXP-55 NQ ALL PASS (2/2 NQ worlds)

runtime_laws.description: Category A — EXPs that changed execution paths. These are laws.

EXP-48_Sharp_Boundary.law: p_exec → EXECUTE/DENY binary separation. Sharp Gap ≥ 70%p.

EXP-44_ECL_Execution.law: Energy conservation. Judgment does not change energy. Only execution converts energy to PnL.

EXP-47_Minimal_Distillation.law: 12 layers → 6 states (E_sign, dE_sign, Shadow, ARG_depth, Regime, AEP_bin)

EXP-52_Worldline_Pruning.law: DEAD worldlines block computation. Survival/death determined using only bar 0-1 information.

EXP-54_Deferred_Compute.runtime_impact: ZOMBIE moved to deferred bucket, false prune 8.4%

EXP-55_Global_Validation.law: Confirmed all laws preserved at NQ large scale (24K bars, 1051 trades).

judge_learning.description: Category B — EXPs that changed the Judge but not SOAR. These are learning rules.

entries.EXP-42_ZOMBIE_Learning: ZOMBIE pattern recognition. Pruning boundary learning.
entries.EXP-43_Computation_Skip: Computation skip rules. Pre-stage of fast_death_check.
entries.EXP-46_Observer_Learning: Observer learning (failed). Proved that observer cannot change execution.

judge_learning.status: SEALED — reflected in runtime, originals preserved

observation_sealed.description: Category C — pure observation/verification EXPs. Documentation + physics proofs.

entries.EXP-01~10: Initial exploration (raw vs soar, gate ablation, calibration)
entries.EXP-20~29: Alpha ecosystem observation (pheromone, ATP, energy, axis, census)
entries.EXP-39_ARG_Relative_Gate: ARG-DENY semantic verification. Gate separation proof.

observation_sealed.status: SEALED — cannot delete, not included in execution path

engineering_statement: We did not create alpha — we separated the physical laws already existing in the market into an executable grammar.
zombie_seal: Worldlines are classified based only on bars 0-2. Alpha that revives afterward is outside the scope of this engine.
